query: UPDATE instituicoes SET tipoServico = 'outros_servicos' WHERE LOWER(categoria) LIKE '%academia%' OR LOWER(categoria) LIKE '%pet%' OR LOWER(categoria) LIKE '%farm%' OR LOWER(nome) LIKE '%academia%' OR LOWER(nome) LIKE '%pet%'
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user TocTSbjr2e5vBbe.81a251891814 --database QrgB7CmSLRUFiNpMh46Kpu --execute UPDATE instituicoes SET tipoServico = 'outros_servicos' WHERE LOWER(categoria) LIKE '%academia%' OR LOWER(categoria) LIKE '%pet%' OR LOWER(categoria) LIKE '%farm%' OR LOWER(nome) LIKE '%academia%' OR LOWER(nome) LIKE '%pet%'
